title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, November 10, 2014
teaser: Today: Chester Wisniewski, from the cybersecurity firm Sophos, about Tor and the recent dark net site shutdowns and arrests.  Plus: William Do, the founder of a failed startup, about being a broke startup founder in San Francisco.
description: Today: Chester Wisniewski, from the cybersecurity firm Sophos, about Tor and the recent dark net site shutdowns and arrests.  Plus: William Do, the founder of a failed startup, about being a broke startup founder in San Francisco.
